name: create_booking
description: Create a gaming station booking at Cuephoria. Requires customer name, phone, station ID, date, and time slot.

customer_name.description: Full name of the customer making the booking

customer_phone.description: Customer phone number (10 digits, can include country code or formatting)

station_id.description: Station ID(s) to book. Can be a single station ID string or array of station IDs for multiple stations

start_time.description: Start time in HH:MM format (24-hour, e.g., 14:00 for 2:00 PM)

end_time.description: End time in HH:MM format (24-hour, e.g., 15:00 for 3:00 PM)

duration.description: Duration in minutes (optional, defaults to 60 minutes)
